Head.title: EventColumn.com find events in your area
Head.meta: EventColumn.com search for and create events in your area

Head.title: EventColumn.com - login to add new Events
This will overwrite the default title
Head.css: this will be added to the list of css files to load (does not overwrite)
Head.js: this will add a new js file(does not overwrite)
Head.meta: this will overwrite the author meta tag
this will add a copyright meta tag or overwrite the copyright meta tag if one exists.
